question.title: Maven Central Deployment in complex Maven Multi Module Project
question.body:
I’m trying to publish a multi-module Maven project to Sonatype Central using the Central Publishing Maven Plugin org.sonatype.central:central-publishing-maven-plugin:0.8.0.

In my small test repo the upload is triggered and works, but in my real project the plugin only stages files. The expected lines:

Going to create .../central-bundle.zip
Going to upload .../central-bundle.zip

never appear.

From the failing run (example for the last module python-parent):

--- central-publishing:0.8.0:publish (injected-central-publishing) @ python-parent ---
[DEBUG] (f) autoPublish = true
[DEBUG] (f) skipPublishing = false
[DEBUG] (f) ignorePublishedComponents = false
[DEBUG] (f) excludeArtifacts = []
[INFO] Using Central baseUrl: https://central.sonatype.com
[INFO] Using credentials from server id central in settings.xml
[INFO] Staging 6 files
...
[INFO] Pre Bundling - deleted .../central-staging/.../python-parent/maven-metadata-central-staging.xml
[INFO] Generate checksums for dir: me/chrissw-r1/python-parent/3.0.5

Immediately after that, the build ends with Reactor Summary / BUILD SUCCESS — there is no:

Going to create .../central-bundle.zip
Going to upload .../central-bundle.zip

Earlier in the same run, the plugin also stages files for the root project (general-parent), so it does run at the aggregator as well — but still never proceeds to bundle/upload at the end.

I expect after all modules have staged their artifacts into target/**/central-staging, the plugin should (once) create central-bundle.zip and upload it to Central (I set autoPublish=true as well).

Instead only staging occurs in multiple modules; the final bundle + upload step is never triggered in the general-parent build.

What am I doing wrong here? You can find my project on https://github.com/ChrissW-R1/general-parent/

question_comments.body: I managed to narrow down the problem. My self developed Maven plugin deploy-pom-maven-plugin causes the issue. It looks like after I interfere in the POM the central-publishing-maven-plugin can't longer find out which execution in the last.
This project is a test, to find my issue. Here everything works fine and the upload will be triggered: github.com/ChrissW-R1/central-upload-test
